document_data.name: ''Skull Blade''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''skull blade''''' was an [[enchanted]], ''+1 [[unholy (weapon quality)|unholy]] [[longsword]]'' wielded by the followers of [[Cyric]].
document_data.Description: The blades and hilts of these [[sword]]s were adorned with the [[holy symbol]] of Cyric. Agents of the ''Prince of Lies'' who traveled incognito typically covered their blades to prevent easy detection when traveling across the Realms.
